services.title: Master's Project
services.popupname: Learn more and check out our Group Project website
services.description: Our team worked to inform decision-making on community forests in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo to protect the critically endangered Eastern Lowland gorilla while improving the wellbeing of local communities

services.title: Saving western monarchs
services.popupname: Learn more and see the Monarchs Project materials
services.description: We promoted the western monarch migration by crafting a communication campaign aimed toward California central coast nurseries and their customers

services.title: Forest Tool
services.popupname: Learn more about the Forest Capstone Project
services.description: Creating a science synthesis platform for forest sustainability to keep forest managers up-to-date with current research developments
